az: 2 me your name alone is poetry i barely know u and already i cant explain this feeling i feel 4 april  i want 2 c u from the moment u leave my side till the moment u return my nonchalant cold heart finally has eyes only 4 april  so now i risk it all just 4 the feeling of joy u bring me i accept the ridicule in exchange for the words u share with me all of this & much more i will do 4 april
